long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,et,fa,fi,fil,:
HubbleIQ is an easy-to-understand WiFi speed test and internet performance monitor. HubbleIQ helps you understand what to expect from your Wifi connection and gives you recommendations that help you fix your WiFi & internet issues on your own. Our extension detects outages and tells you the cause of it.

HubbleIQ is not like other speed test apps. Our tool is designed to help you understand what your speed test results actually mean and helps you anticipate issues on your Zoom, WebEx, Skype, Bluejeans, and Hangout video meetings.

Features:

● On-demand and automatic WiFi & internet speed test 
● Internet outage type detection - WiFi network or Internet Service Provider
● Tailored recommendations, help articles, and fixes.
● Internet & WiFi speed test results logging
● Test results sharing and exporting for easy remote help assistance
● Color-coded status indicator for WIFI & internet performance and health

Install the HubbleIQ Chrome extension and run a WiFi quality and internet speed test before every video call.

Interested in HubbleIQ for your organization? 

HubbleIQ for enterprise helps you empower your remote users to support themselves as they work from home. When help is needed, we make requesting and providing help quick and easy, no matter how technical your users are. To learn more about how HubbleIQ can transform the way you support your employees, students, and customers, visit us at HubbleIQ.com or e-mail us at contact@hubbleiq.com

Stay connected:

● Visit us: https://hubbleiq.com
● Like us on Facebook: https://facebook.com/hubbleiq
● Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/hubbleiq
● Follow us on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/hubbleiq

Email: contact@hubbleiq.com

Use Cases: 

Work from home
HubbleIQ was built to help remote workers navigate the world of unpredictable WiFi and internet performance. Whether you work from home, a hotel, or a coffee shop, it’s important to understand the quality of your WiFi and internet connection, especially before video calls.

Distance learning
HubbleIQ helps students and teachers manage their internet connection from any remote location. Good connectivity is critical for remote participation and engagement. 

Telehealth
HubbleIQ helps remote patients manage their connection with their doctor, physician, and healthcare professional. Managing connection quality in telehealth helps ensure health problems are diagnosed and proper care is provided. 

FAQ

Why HubbleIQ's WIFI performance, outage, and internet speed test? 

HubbleIQ believes that the internet and WiFi issues should be anticipated and avoided. Many people run internet speed test apps to either determine how fast their internet is compared to their subscription or to resolve issues. HubbleIQ takes speed test to the next level and helps you achieve these things with a simple click of a button.

-
How does it work?

HubbleIQ performs a WIFI quality, reliability, and internet speed test. By looking at factors including upload internet speed, download internet speed, jitter, and latency, it can warn you if your network is at a high risk of poor performance or interruption. HubbleIQ will warn you if you should expect issues.  It doesn’t matter what video conferencing you are on, whether it is Zoom, WebEx, Skype, BlueJeans, or any other calls, we offer suggestions to fix or avoid the issue altogether.

-
What's the difference between a WiFi & Internet speed test?

The internet is often referred to as simply WiFi. However, it is important to distinguish between these two things. WiFi is your local wireless network. This is what your devices connect to within your home or living space. The performance of your WiFi typically relies on signal strength, or the 802.11 standard your wireless devices support. See below for the list of WiFi standards and their performance.

80211.b - Max Data Rate - 11Mbps
802.11a - Max Data Rate - 54Mbps
802.11g - Max Data Rate - 54Mbps
802.11n - Max Data Rate - 450Mbps
802.11ac - Max Data Rate - 1,300Mbps or 1.3Gbps

The internet, however, is what connects your local WiFi network to your online services, such as Zoom, WebEx, Facebook, Netflix, and everything else over the internet. Your WiFi network and connection to the Internet both matter when running a speed test, and your connection will only be as fast as your weakest link.

You can learn more about this by visiting the HubbleIQ help center. https://hubbleiq.app/howtospeedtest

-
How is HubbleIQ different from other speed test apps?

HubbleIQ does not only test for speed. It tests for network quality, reliability, and consistency. All of these factors are critical when you work from home and taking remote video meetings. We put the power of knowledge in the hands of everyone, no matter how technical they are.

-
Can HubbleIQ run on my smartphone?

If you’d like to run a HubbleIQ outage and speed test on your smartphone, visit our browser-based app at hubbleiq.app/trynow

-
How does HubbleIQ know what my experience will be with my video conferencing tool (eg: Zoom, WebEx, BlueJeans, Skype, Hangout)

Every video conferencing tool works a little differently. Although Zoom, WebEx, BlueJeans Skype, and Hangouts are different video conferencing applications, they all have similar requirements when it comes to making a call successfully. For example, Zoom calls require 1 - 4Mbps for satisfactory video experience. WebEx, Skype & BlueJeans require about the same. More importantly, all of these applications rely on network stability, consistency, and not just speed. HubbleIQ tests for all of these things to help you be prepared before every video call.

-
Can HubbleIQ integrate in my calendar?

HubbleIQ continually evaluates features that will make our performance and speed test more valuable to our users. Calendar integration is on our roadmap, along with other features that ensure that your WiFi & internet connection is sufficient for Zoom, WebEx, Skype, and Bluejeans meetings. If you'd like to join our BETA program, you can sign up below and be the first to know when we support calendar integration. https://www.hubbleiq.com/beta-signup

-
Does HubbleIQ work over VPN?

Yes. HubbleIQ can perform WIFI quality and internet speed test apps over VPN connections. VPNs may sometimes slow down internet speeds and quality, impacting your experience with applications such as Zoom, WebEx, Skype & BlueJeans. The ‘results history’ log in HubbleIQ can help you determine if your VPN client is slowing down your internet speed and causing your connection to disconnect frequently. If you suspect your VPN is slowing down your internet speed and performance, you can export your results to your support technician and help them resolve the issue quickly for you.

-
What about my data?

Data privacy is very important to us. HubbleIQ does NOT require any special access permissions to install and use. Visit HubbleIQ.com for our full data privacy policy.

-
Disclaimer:

Skype is a trademark of Microsoft. This application and its developer(s) are in no way affiliated with Microsoft. 
WebEx is a trademark of Cisco Systems. This application and its developer(s) are in no way affiliated with Cisco WebEx.
This application and its developer(s) are in no way affiliated with Bluejeans, Zoom, Facebook, and Netflix

-
HubblelQ was made for remote workers, by remote workers. We believe the future of work is remote. Our mission is to provide regular people with enterprise quality tools so they can work, live, and learn from more places.
long.en,en_AU:
HubbleIQ SpeedTest: Powerful Internet & WiFi Performance Monitoring

Know about internet slowdowns and diagnose WiFi issues with HubbleIQ SpeedTest, the top Chrome extension for network performance analysis.

Technical users rejoice! HubbleIQ offers more than just a user-friendly speed test. Manage entire organizations and teams with our extension, or integrate network monitoring directly into your applications with the HubbleIQ SDK.

Here's what HubbleIQ SpeedTest offers:

- Detailed Speed Testing: Measure download, upload speeds, and latency (ping) for smooth streaming, video calls, and online gaming.
- In-depth WiFi Analysis: Gauge signal strength, identify dead zones, and troubleshoot connectivity issues.
- Actionable Insights: Get recommendations to optimize your internet and WiFi performance.
- Historical Performance Tracking: Monitor past speed tests and compare performance over time.
- Real-time Alerts: Stay informed about internet performance changes.
- Enterprise-ready Management: Monitor and manage internet performance for remote teams (HubbleIQ Plus).
- Developer-friendly SDK: Integrate network performance monitoring directly into your applications (HubbleIQ SDK).


Perfect for:

- IT Professionals: Proactively troubleshoot network issues for remote teams.
- Network Engineers: Gain deep insights into network performance.
- Remote Workers and Students: Ensure seamless online meetings and learning.
- Gamers: Eliminate lag and enjoy uninterrupted gameplay.
- Anyone who relies on a fast and reliable internet connection.

Upgrade your internet experience today! Install HubbleIQ SpeedTest for free on the Chrome Web Store.

For enterprise management and SDK details, visit HubbleIQ.com
long.en_GB,en_US:
A friendly speed test to monitor internet speed, WiFi strength, ISP outages, and to get recommendations.

Tired of slow internet? WiFi crashes? Need a speed test extension for your Chrome browser that you can rely on? Look no further than Simple SpeedTest - A speed test for Chrome. 

Test your internet & WiFi with Simple SpeedTest for Chrome.

Every time you open your Chrome web browser, Simple SpeedTest - A speed test for Chrome automatically checks how your WiFi and internet are performing. 

Fight back against dropped Zoom calls, laggy video games, and woefully slow streaming speeds. Simple SpeedTest - A speed test for Chrome gives you recommendations to fix your WiFi or internet issues without the need for IT support. 

If your internet cuts out or disconnects, Simple SpeedTest will tell you if your WiFi or your internet service provider (ISP) is at fault.

Simple SpeedTest - A speed test for Chrome can… 

✈️Test your upload and download speeds
🎥Determine how well your Google Meets, Zoom, Skype, or other video calls will perform over your WiFi and internet
🛎️Test your latency via a “ping test”. Ping tests determine how quickly information gets sent back and forth from your web server
💁Give you recommendations from your speed test to improve your WiFi and internet connection 
📚Track and export history from prior speed tests

Kick slow internet speeds and poor WiFi connections to the curb with Simple SpeedTest - A speed test for Chrome. This speed test is perfect for remote workers, students, gamers, or anyone else that wants to make sure their internet and WiFi connections are optimally performing. 

HubbleIQ Plus for Remote Employee & Technology Management

HubbleIQ can help you remotely speed test and monitor the connection of your remote employees, CX contact center agents, students, and customers. 

➡️Easily Integrate HubbleIQ to automatically open incidents and tickets in Zendesk, Freshdesk, ServiceNow, Asana, Jira, and any other Service Management tool you are already using today! 
📕 Use the free and included WiFi Help Center (wifihelpcenter.com) knowledge base to help users solve their own technical issues with self-service.

To learn more, visit HubbleIQ.com/speedtest or e-mail us at contact@hubbleiq.com to learn more.

Stay connected:

● Try our browser based speed test: https://wifispotcheck.com
● Visit us: https://hubbleiq.com/speedtest
● Like us on Facebook: https://facebook.com/hubbleiq
● Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/hubbleiq
● Follow us on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/hubbleiq

Email: contact@hubbleiq.com
long.es:
Un prueba de velocidad amigable para monitorear la velocidad de Internet, la fuerza de WiFi, interrupciones de proveedores de servicios de Internet, y recibir recomendaciones.

¿Cansado de internet lento? ¿Se cae el WiFi? ¿Necesita una extensión de prueba de velocidad para su navegador Chrome en la que pueda confiar? No busque más que Simple SpeedTest: una prueba de velocidad para Chrome.

Pruebe su internet y WiFi con Simple SpeedTest para Chrome.

Cada vez que abra su navegador web Chrome, Simple SpeedTest - una prueba de velocidad para Chrome verifica automáticamente el rendimiento de su WiFi e Internet.

Luche contra las llamadas de Zoom interrumpidas, los juegos de video con retrasos y las velocidades de transmisión dolorosamente lentas. Simple SpeedTest - una prueba de velocidad para Chrome le brinda recomendaciones para solucionar sus problemas de WiFi o Internet sin necesidad de soporte técnico.

Si su Internet se corta o se desconecta, Simple SpeedTest le dirá si el problema es su WiFi o su proveedor de servicios de Internet (ISP).

Prueba de velocidad (Speed Test) de Internet y monitor de conectividad puede ....

✈️Probar las velocidades de carga y descarga
🎥Determinar qué tan bien funcionarán sus llamadas de video en Google Meets, Zoom, Skype u otras aplicaciones de llamadas de video con su WiFi e Internet
🛎️Probar su latencia a través de una "prueba de ping". Las pruebas de ping determinan qué tan rápido se envía la información de ida y vuelta desde su servidor web.
💁Darle recomendaciones a partir de su prueba de velocidad para mejorar su conexión de WiFi e Internet.
📚Realizar un seguimiento y exportar el historial de pruebas de velocidad anteriores.

Diga adiós a las velocidades lentas de Internet y las malas conexiones de WiFi con Simple SpeedTest - una prueba de velocidad para Chrome. Esta prueba de velocidad es perfecta para trabajadores remotos, estudiantes, jugadores o cualquier persona que quiera asegurarse de que sus conexiones de Internet y WiFi estén funcionando de manera óptima.

HubbleIQ Plus para la gestión de empleados remotos y tecnología

HubbleIQ puede ayudarlo a realizar pruebas de velocidad y monitorear la conexión de sus empleados remotos, agentes de centros de contacto CX, estudiantes y clientes de forma remota.

➡️Integre fácilmente HubbleIQ para abrir automáticamente incidentes y tickets en Zendesk, Freshdesk, ServiceNow, Asana, Jira y cualquier otra herramienta de gestión de servicios que esté utilizando actualmente.
📕Utilice la base de conocimientos gratuita y incluida en el Centro de Ayuda de WiFi (wifihelpcenter.com) para ayudar a los usuarios a resolver sus propios problemas técnicos con autoservicio.

Para obtener más información, visite HubbleIQ.com/speedtest o envíenos un correo electrónico a contact@hubbleiq.com para obtener más información.

Manténgase conectado:

● Pruebe nuestra prueba de velocidad basada en el navegador: https://wifispotcheck.com
● Visítenos: https://hubbleiq.com/speedtest
● Denos un "me gusta" en Facebook: https://facebook.com/hubbleiq
● Síganos en Twitter: https://twitter.com/hubbleiq
● Síganos en LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/hubbleiq


2 / 2

Una prueba de velocidad amigable para monitorear la velocidad de Internet, la fuerza de WiFi, interrupciones de proveedores de servicios de Internet y recibir recomendaciones.

¿Cansado de una conexión lenta a Internet? ¿Se cae tu WiFi? ¿Necesitas una extensión de prueba de velocidad para tu navegador Chrome en la que puedas confiar? No busques más allá de Simple SpeedTest: una prueba de velocidad para Chrome.

Prueba tu Internet y WiFi con Simple SpeedTest para Chrome.

Cada vez que abras tu navegador web Chrome, Simple SpeedTest - una prueba de velocidad para Chrome verificará automáticamente el rendimiento de tu WiFi e Internet.

Lucha contra las interrupciones en tus llamadas de Zoom, los juegos de video con retrasos y las velocidades de transmisión dolorosamente lentas. Simple SpeedTest - una prueba de velocidad para Chrome te ofrece recomendaciones para solucionar tus problemas de WiFi o Internet sin necesidad de soporte técnico.

Si tu conexión a Internet se corta o se desconecta, Simple SpeedTest te dirá si el problema es tu WiFi o tu proveedor de servicios de Internet (ISP).

La Prueba de velocidad (Speed Test) de Internet y el monitor de conectividad pueden:

✈️ Probar las velocidades de carga y descarga
🎥 Determinar qué tan bien funcionarán tus llamadas de video en Google Meet, Zoom, Skype y otras aplicaciones de videoconferencia con tu WiFi e Internet.
🛎️ Probar la latencia a través de una "prueba de ping". Las pruebas de ping determinan qué tan rápido se envía la información de ida y vuelta desde tu servidor web.
💁 Proporcionarte recomendaciones a partir de tu prueba de velocidad para mejorar tu conexión de WiFi e Internet.
📚 Realizar un seguimiento y exportar el historial de pruebas de velocidad anteriores.

Dile adiós a las velocidades lentas de Internet y las malas conexiones de WiFi con Simple SpeedTest - una prueba de velocidad para Chrome. Esta prueba de velocidad es perfecta para trabajadores remotos, estudiantes, jugadores o cualquier persona que quiera asegurarse de que sus conexiones de Internet y WiFi estén funcionando de manera óptima.

HubbleIQ Plus para la gestión remota de empleados y tecnología.

HubbleIQ puede ayudarte a realizar pruebas de velocidad y monitorear la conexión de tus empleados remotos, agentes de centros de contacto CX, estudiantes y clientes de forma remota.

➡️ Integra fácilmente HubbleIQ para abrir automáticamente incidentes y tickets en Zendesk, Freshdesk, ServiceNow, Asana, Jira y cualquier otra herramienta de gestión de servicios que estés utilizando actualmente.
📕 Utiliza el Centro de Ayuda de WiFi (wifihelpcenter.com) gratuito e incluido para ayudar a los usuarios a resolver sus propios problemas técnicos con autoservicio.

Para obtener más información, visita HubbleIQ.com/speedtest o envíanos un correo electrónico a contact@hubbleiq.com.

Mantente conectado:

● Prueba nuestra prueba de velocidad basada en el navegador: https://wifispotcheck.com
● Visítanos: https://hubbleiq.com/speedtest
● Danos un "Me gusta" en Facebook: https://facebook.com/hubbleiq
● Síguenos en Twitter: https://twitter.com/hubbleiq
● Síguenos en LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/hubbleiq
